SharedStorageSelectURLOperation.summary: NOTE Experimental The SharedStorageSelectURLOperation interface of the {{domxref("Shared Storage API", "Shared Storage API", "", "nocode")}} represents a URL Selection output gate operation.

SharedStorageSelectURLOperationRun.summary: NOTE Experimental The run() method of the interface defines the structure to which the run() method defined inside a URL Selection output gate operation should conform.
SharedStorageSelectURLOperationRun.returns: A that fulfills with a number defining the array index of the URL selected by the operation.
